cause.description:
Partially hydrogenated oils can be found in most food closets around the United States, since they are manufactured into most foods. They have serious health risks and should be banned from all food!!!
this is the real website for this: http://www.bantransfats.com/index.html
ps--there is no beneficiary for ban trans fats, so if you want to donate then go to the website listed above
1. The fats can cause obesity, cancer, or even death.
2. Most European countries have already banned them.
cause.mission: ban partially hydrogenated oils from foods nation-wide
cause.name: Ban Trans Fats
